{"step_by_step_thinking": "This study design involves comparing a group of individuals with a specific outcome (interstitial lung disease) to a group without the outcome. The participants are matched in age and geographic location, and their exposure to the fire retardant chemical is assessed. This design is not a randomized controlled trial because the exposure is not being randomly assigned. It is also not a case series because it includes a comparison group. The best description for this study design is a case-control study.", "answer_choice": "A"}
